text: Events from the year 1896 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Nicholas II ==Events== * 1896 World Figure Skating Championships * All-Russia Exhibition 1896 * Khodynka Tragedy * Ādolfs Alunāns Theatre ==Births== Lev Vygotsky. ==Deaths== * 13 October - Alexander Theodorowicz Batalin, botanist (b. 1847) * * * ==References== 1896 in Russia Category:Years of the 19th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1896 in Russia
